{{Infobox TV channel| name= Jetix (Turkey)| logofile= Jetix.png| logosize= 220px| logoalt= | launch= [[April 1]], [[2000]]| owner= [[Disney-ABC Television Group]]| former names= [[Fox Kids]] (until [[January 1]], [[2005]])| sister names= [[Jetix Play]]| web= [http://www.jetix.com.tr www.jetix.com.tr]| terr avail=Not Available| terr serv 1= | terr chan 1= | sat serv 1= [[Digiturk]]| sat chan 1= Channel 62| sat serv 2= | sat chan 2= | sat serv 3= | sat chan 3= | cable serv 1= | cable chan 1= | |}}
'''Jetix (Turkey)''' was a children's television programming brand owned by [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] broadcasts in [[Turkey]]. It was previously known as '''[[Fox Kids]]'''.
==Disney XD rebrand== When [[Disney XD]] successfully launched on February 13, 2009, in the US, [[Disney-ABC Television Group]] was rolled out to France on April 1, 2009 and it began to broadcast in Turkey on October 3, 2009.<ref name="Disney XD"> {{cite web |url=http://www.broadbandtvnews.com/?p=14241 |title=French Jetix becomes Disney XD |publisher=Broadband TV News |date=2009-02-16 }}</ref><ref name="Disney XD2"> {{cite web |url=http://www.c21media.net/resources/detail.asp?area=79&article=47666 |title=Jetix France rebrands as Disney XD |publisher=[[C21 Media]] |date=2009-02-17 }}</ref>
